description: Reece Cole's second-half equaliser earns Exeter a draw against Wigan at St James Park.
title: Exeter City 1-1 Wigan Athletic
title_page: Exeter City 1-1 Wigan Athletic - BBC Sport
maintext:
Since losing seven successive league meetings with Wigan from 1995 to 2023, Exeter are unbeaten in their last two against the Latics (W1 D1).
Wigan Athletic have won each of their last four away league games against Exeter City, twice scoring exactly four goals in a match during that time.
Exeter boss Gary Caldwell played 102 league games and managed 65 league games for Wigan. His only previous home game against his former club since leaving as manager saw his Exeter side lose 0-2 in October 2023.
Wigan have won just one of their last seven league games played on a Tuesday (D2 L4) and have failed to win each of their last nine away league outings on this day (D4 L5) since beating Stoke 1-0 in April 2023.
